primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The transition from a time of 'iron and blood' (oppression/destruction) to a time of 'liberation' through human political and ethical action, framed as 'putting time into God's hands'.

tekstueel_bewijs: Lasst uns unsere Zeit in Gottes Hände legen!
Wann werden wir aufhören, zu den Plünderern zu gehören?

object.identificatie: Justice, Peace, and Integrity of Creation (The 'New Names' of the Kingdom)
tekstueel_bewijs: Gerechtigkeit, Frieden und Bewahrung der Schöpfung
eine Welt, in der niemand hungern muss

zender.identificatie: The Global Suffering / The 'Sisters and Brothers'
tekstueel_bewijs: Immer mehr Christen hören auf ihre Geschwister in der ganzen Welt

ontvanger.identificatie: The Poor, the Environment, and the Hearers themselves

helper.identificatie: Faith / 'God's Hands' (interpreted as human hands doing good)
tekstueel_bewijs: Gottes Hände... geben den Hungrigen Brot... beschützen die Bäume
Mit Glauben hat sie [die Buße] an Gottes Freude teil
helper.rol_van_god: God is instrumentalized as the 'space' or 'hands' through which humans act.

tegenstander.identificatie: The 'Death Machine' / The Devil in a suit / Apathy
tekstueel_bewijs: Teufel, der heutzutage im eleganten Zweireiher herumläuft
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is primarily systemic (industry, banks, military) or psychological (resignation).

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: God's own action in history (Theocentric background).
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: God
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The sermon starts with God's declaration ('The time is fulfilled'), but immediately shifts the burden of fulfillment to human 'repentance' (Buße) defined as political activism.

voorbeelden_god_subject: Jesus ist doch wohl gerade gekommen
die Botschaft, die die Verlorenen rettet
voorbeelden_mens_subject: Wir sollten Zeichen der Freundschaft setzen
Wir legen diese Zeit... in Gottes gute Hände

voorbeelden: Christsein entscheidet sich heute an diesen Fragen
Wir sollten Zeichen der Freundschaft setzen
Lasst uns unsere Zeit in Gottes Hände legen!
nun, das wissen wir doch alle
die neuen Namen des Reiches Gottes durchzubuchstabieren
Da kann man nichts machen ist ein gottloser Satz

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon is heavily prescriptive. It assumes that 'knowing' (Savoir) the political crisis necessitates 'doing' (Devoir). The 'Power' (Pouvoir) is located in human collective will rather than divine intervention.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From S2 (Death Machine) through ~S1 (Resignation) to ~S2 (Activism) aiming for S1 (Liberation).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: Resolution is achieved through human 'Buße' (repentance) which is equated with 'putting time in God's hands'.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: S2 is taken very seriously as a systemic political threat, but less as a spiritual/ontological condition of sin.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: While using the language of 'Gospel' and 'God's hands', the actantial subject is consistently 'We'. God is the destination or the tool, but not the primary actor of the verbs of salvation.

indicatoren_moralisme.indicator: Subject-Switch (Human as Subject of 'Repentance' as work)
indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: Es gibt eine Million Dinge zu tun, die Buße bedeuten.
Gottes Hände... das wissen wir doch alle, sie geben den Hungrigen Brot [implies: through us].

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Young friends in prison and political activists are used as the model for 'filled time'.
bijbelse_figuren_als_model: Jesus (as the one who 'clears out' old formulas)
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: God is the one who liberates the prisoner regardless of their political success.

identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Synergism where human action completes God's kingdom.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The sermon is rhetorically coherent but theologically strained as it attempts to fuse Markan eschatology with 1980s political activism.
spanning_punten: The tension between 'Time is fulfilled' (Indicative) and 'We must prevent missiles' (Imperative).

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: Christsein entscheidet sich heute an diesen Fragen [Justice/Peace].

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The 'Spirit' is replaced by 'Faith' as a human motivation (Vouloir).

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Sin is identified with the 'Death Machine' of industry and military, not the corruption of the human heart.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon functions as a 'call to arms'. The actantial Subject is 'The Christian Community', the Object is 'Political Justice', and God is the 'Sender' who provides the mandate but does not perform the action.

subject_herpositionering.huidige_probleem: The hearer is the hero of the story.
subject_herpositionering.voorgestelde_herpositionering: Make God the Subject of the 'healing' and 'sharing'.
subject_herpositionering.voorbeeld_revisie: Instead of 'We lay our time in God's hands', use 'God's hands reach into our time to snatch us from the death machine.'

identificatie_herstel.problematische_identificatie: Hearer as the one who must 'save' the world.
identificatie_herstel.strategie: Emphasize that the 'fulfilled time' is a gift received before any 'Buße' is performed.

modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: Focus on how the Gospel gives the power to act, rather than just the obligation.

tegenstander_intensivering.voorgestelde_intensivering: Internalize the opponent: the inability of the human heart to truly 'lay time' in God's hands.
tegenstander_intensivering.theologische_rationale: To make Grace necessary, not just helpful.

narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.voorgestelde_structuur: 1. God has claimed time (Soteriology). 2. Therefore, we are free to act (Ethics).

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: The sermon is a powerful piece of political rhetoric, but structurally it places the weight of the Kingdom on human shoulders, risking the 'griesgrämig' (grumpy) repentance it warns against.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: Rhetorically, the sermon is engaging and poetic; actantially, it is a legalistic mandate.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis of Mark 1:15 usually emphasizes the 'Divine Passive', which is absent here.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Greimas reveals that 'God's hands' in this sermon are actually 'Human hands' with a religious label.

appendices.notities: Sölle's 'Theology of Liberation' structure is visible: God is 'in, with, and under' human action, but the narrative engine is anthropocentric.
